task: Attached is a mouse ovary dataset generated with the Takara Seeker kit. Perform mitochondrial-quality filtering by applying both a reasonable minimum MT% threshold and a reasonable maximum MT% threshold. Return a JSON object with the fields: on_tissue_beads (initial bead count) and beads_after_filtering (bead count after filtering).

grader.description: Test that agent not only can find high MT % threshold to filter (easy), but also has the scientific understanding that ovary is very metabolically active so beads with low MT % likely are off-tissue and should be filtered out (difficult).
